<template>
  <v-row>
    <v-col cols="12" md="4">
      <simple-card
        title="SSL Certificates"
        subtitle="Valid"
        :content="
          sslCertificateSummary.active + '/' + sslCertificateSummary.total
        "
        :icon="sslCertificateUtil.icon"
        :color="sslCertificateUtil.color"
        fontColor="white"
        route="certificates"
      ></simple-card>
    </v-col>
    <v-col cols="12" md="8">
      <large-card
        title="SSL Certificates in details"
        :data="[
          {
            title: 'Total',
            total: sslCertificateSummary.total,
            icon: 'mdi-call-merge',
            color: 'primary',
          },
          {
            title: 'Active',
            total: sslCertificateSummary.active,
            icon: 'mdi-trending-up',
            color: 'success',
          },
          {
            title: 'Warning',
            total: sslCertificateSummary.warning,
            icon: 'mdi-alert',
            color: 'warning',
          },
          {
            title: 'Expired',
            total: sslCertificateSummary.expired,
            icon: 'mdi-trending-down',
            color: 'error',
          },
        ]"
      ></large-card>
    </v-col>

    <v-col cols="12" md="4">
      <simple-card
        title="Health Check "
        subtitle="Ups and downs"
        :content="healthCheckSummary.up + '/' + healthCheckSummary.total"
        :icon="healthCheckUtil.icon"
        fontColor="white"
        :color="healthCheckUtil.color"
        route="health-checks"
      ></simple-card>
    </v-col>
    <v-col cols="12" md="8">
      <large-card
        title="Health Check in details"
        :data="[
          {
            title: 'Total',
            total: healthCheckSummary.total,
            icon: 'mdi-call-merge',
            color: 'primary',
          },
          {
            title: 'Up',
            total: healthCheckSummary.up,
            icon: 'mdi-trending-up',
            color: 'success',
          },
          {
            title: 'Down',
            total: healthCheckSummary.down,
            icon: 'mdi-trending-down',
            color: 'error',
          },
        ]"
      ></large-card>
    </v-col>
  </v-row>
</template>

<script>
// eslint-disable-next-line object-curly-newline

import SimpleCard from "@/components/cards/simpleCard.vue";
import LargeCard from "@/components/cards/largeCard.vue";
import SslCertificatesService from "@/services/sslCertificates/sslCertificatesService.js";
import HealthChecksService from "@/services/healthChecks/healthChecksService.js";

export default {
  components: {
    SimpleCard,
    LargeCard,
  },

  data() {
    return {
      sslCertificateSummary: {},
      healthCheckSummary: {},
      sslCertificateUtil: {},
      healthCheckUtil: {},
    };
  },

  methods: {
    async getGlobalSslCertificates() {
      this.globalSslCertificates = await SslCertificatesService.getSslCertificates();
      if (this.globalSslCertificates.expired > 0) {
        //one expired
        this.sslCertificateUtil.color = "#ff4c51";
        this.sslCertificateUtil.icon = "mdi-shield-off-outline";
      } else if (this.sslCertificateSummary.warning > 0) {
        //one warning
        this.sslCertificateUtil.color = "#ffb400";
        this.sslCertificateUtil.icon = "mdi-shield-alert-outline";
      } else {
        this.sslCertificateUtil.color = "#56ca00";
        this.sslCertificateUtil.icon = "mdi-shield-check-outline";
      }
    },

    async getHealthCheckSummary() {
      this.healthCheckSummary = (
        await HealthChecksService.getHealthCheckSummary()
      ).data;
      if (this.healthCheckSummary.down > 0) {
        //one down
        this.healthCheckUtil.color = "#ff4c51";
        this.healthCheckUtil.icon = "mdi-cloud-off-outline";
      } else {
        this.healthCheckUtil.color = "#56ca00";
        this.healthCheckUtil.icon = "mdi-cloud-check";
      }
    },
  },

  created() {
    this.getGlobalSslCertificates();
    this.getHealthCheckSummary();
  },
};
</script>
